title: Sign In
description: Sign in to access your learning courses
inAppBrowserDescription: Google blocks sign-in in embedded browsers for security. Please open this page in your default browser.
iosOpenInstructions: Tap the Safari icon or menu (⋯) to open in your browser.

hero.title: Learn Any Subject with AI-Generated Courses
hero.subtitle: Choose a topic, and AI creates a structured course with lessons, quizzes, and an interactive tutor — personalized to your level.

choose.title: Choose a Topic
choose.description: Pick any STEM subject — math, physics, CS, and more. Set your level and preferences.

generate.title: AI Generates Your Course
generate.description: AI builds a structured course with lessons organized as a prerequisite graph, not a flat list.

learn.title: Learn at Your Own Pace
learn.description: Study lessons in parallel, take quizzes, chat with an AI tutor, and track your progress.

generation.title: AI Course Generation
generation.description: Structured courses with lessons, definitions, theorems, worked examples, and visualizations.

quizzes.title: Adaptive Quizzes
quizzes.description: Auto-generated quizzes that adapt to your weak areas and track your mastery.

chat.title: AI Tutor Chat
chat.description: Ask questions about any lesson and get instant, context-aware explanations.

graph.title: Prerequisite Graphs
graph.description: See how lessons connect. Study in parallel when prerequisites are met.

export.title: Export & Share
export.description: Export to Markdown, JSON, or print. Share courses with a link or clone from the gallery.

gallery.title: Course Gallery
gallery.description: Browse community courses, try free previews, and clone courses to customize.

featuredCourses.title: Featured Courses
featuredCourses.subtitle: Try a free preview — no account needed.
